25 #include <cassert>

27 #include <randomvar.hpp>
28 #include <simul.hpp>

30 #include <interrupt.hpp>
31 #include <task.hpp>

33 namespace RTSim {
34 
35  using namespace std;
36  using namespace MetaSim;
37 
38  Interrupt::Interrupt(RandomVar *iat,
39  int burstperiod,
40  RandomVar *burstlenght, const char *name) :
41  Entity(name),
42  int_time(iat),
43  bp(burstperiod),
44  burst_lenght(burstlenght),
45  count(0),
46  max_act(0)
47  {
48  if (burst_lenght == NULL) burst_lenght = new DeltaVar(1);
49  register_handler(triggerEvt, this, &Interrupt::onTrigger);
50  }
51 
52  Interrupt::~Interrupt()
53  {
54  delete int_time;
55  delete burst_lenght;
56  }
57 
58  void Interrupt::addTask(Task *t)
59  {
60  tasks.push_back(t);
61  }
62 
63  void Interrupt::newRun()
64  {
65  assert(int_time != NULL);
66  assert(burst_lenght != NULL);
67 
68  triggerEvt.post((int)(int_time->get()));
69  max_act = static_cast<int>(burst_lenght->get());
70  count = 0;
71  }
72 
73  void Interrupt::endRun()
74  {
75  }
76 
77  void Interrupt::onTrigger(Event *e)
78  {
79  for (unsigned int i=0; i<tasks.size(); ++i) tasks[i]->activate();
80 
81  count ++;
82  if (count == max_act) {
83  triggerEvt.post(SIMUL.getTime() + (int)(int_time->get()));
84  max_act = static_cast<int>(burst_lenght->get());
85  count = 0;
86  }
87  else
88  triggerEvt.post(SIMUL.getTime() + bp);
89  }
90 
91 }
